channel.title: Toy Horsey Continued:D
channel.description:
Okay so this is in response to my other topic which is here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,531289.0.html Okay anyways i successfully added the animations but instead of in client.java (server-sided) I did it in potions.java but the [code=actionscript]plrText = "Come on Dobbin, we can win the race!";[/code] part didn't work it gave me a compile error.. anyway here's the code i put in potions.java [code=abap] case 2522: c.setAnimation(919); //plrText = "Come on Dobbin, we can win the race!"; break;[/code] the only part I'm missing is the part to make the player shout if anyone could help it would be greatly appreciated. :)
EDIT: heres the compile error: [code=abap]potions.java:20: cannot find symbol symbol : variable plrText location: class potions plrText = "Come on Dobbin, we can win the race!"; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]

item.title: Toy Horsey Continued:D
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Okay so this is in response to my other topic which is here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,531289.0.html
Okay anyways i successfully added the animations but instead of in client.java (server-sided) I did it in potions.java but the plrText = "Come on Dobbin, we can win the race!"; part didn’t work it gave me a compile error… anyway here’s the code i put in potions.java case 2522: c.setAnimation(919); //plrText = "Come on Dobbin, we can win the race!"; break;
the only part I’m missing is the part to make the player shout if anyone could help it would be greatly appreciated.

EDIT: heres the compile error: [code=abap]potions.java:20: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable plrText
location: class potions
plrText = “Come on Dobbin, we can win the race!”;
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]
